mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE board_part = 10 ORDER BY reg_date DESC ) t1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT t3.*, ROWNUM FROM( SELECT t2.image_name AS imageName, t2.target_no AS targetNo FROM tour t1 JOIN image t2 ON t1.tour_no = t2.target_no WHERE t2.table_name = 'tour' ORDER BY t1.views DESC )t3 )WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT t3.*, ROWNUM FROM( SELECT t2.image_name AS imageName, t2.target_no AS targetNo FROM festival t1 JOIN image t2 ON t1.festa_no = t2.target_no WHERE t2.table_name = 'festival' ORDER BY t1.end_date DESC )t3 )WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
